location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 608/36 'Payments to the Imperial Bank of Persia (on a/c of HM Minister at Tehran)'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 108; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file comprises telegrams, despatches, correspondence, memoranda, and notes, relating to payments made to the Imperial Bank of Persia on the account of HM Minister at Tehran.The file features the following principal correspondents: the Under-Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs; the Under-Secretary of State for India; and HM Minister, Tehran.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs
